Directions: In a large saucepan or soup kettle, cook the sausage and onion until meat is no longer pink; drain. Add the next 12 ingredients. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add beans; heat through.
Ingredients: 1 pound turkey Italian sausage links, casings removed
3 medium tart apples, peeled and chopped
1 (16 ounce) can kidney beans, rinsed and drained
